name: Butterfly Javascript Game
tagline: A butterfly adventure -very basic- game sample made with javascript (and game development videos)
body:
### How to make a video game? (and basic artificial intelligence)
A web series (game dev tutorial videos) to teach people how to make a 2D web based game with Javascript, html and css (in Turkish)

* Play game; https://goo.gl/Fr2EUR
* Download source; https://goo.gl/F5QmUO
* Project page; http://goo.gl/g2XTWx

![2D game development artificial intelligence](http://bug7a.github.io/butterfly-javascript-game/preview.png)

(Keywords; javascript, game development, game dev, game, howto, make, tutorial, 2D, atari, artificial intelligence, mobile)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
